title: prabhO tiruppadiyil
sahitya:
prabhO tiruppadiyil vadiyum perumanE navanidhiyin nAyakanE
surapatiyum paramanum vidhiyum anaivarum tudikkum venkaTanE


anupallavi

  nadiyuDan anal aravuDan taN matiyuDan naTamADum Ishan
satiyin sOdaran shrIdharan vaLar rati maNALanait-tandavan


caraNam    nIlamagaL kaDal alaimagaL tozhum nIlamEgha mEnian avan
nIL pugazh tanai nALum ninaindAl kOL en seyyum kulamum uyyum
